sentences.translation: 我们已得到了一些答复。

sentences.sentence: For a believer, replies to all the questions about life and work are far different because he trusts in God.
sentences.translation: 对一个信徒来说，对所有生活和工作问题的回答是大不一样的，因为他相信上帝。

sentences.sentence: Their replies were no more than grunts of acknowledgement.
sentences.translation: 他们的回答不过是表示感谢的咕哝声。
